categories: Category:Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker

nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 29 is the twenty-ninth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It features the stories "Ghosts of Kashyyyk, Part 3," by John Barber, and "Secret Agent Droids, Part 3," by Michael Moreci. The issue was published by IDW Publishing as a Journey to Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker title on December 18, 2019.

In this finale of a three-part story, the mighty Wookiees of Kashyyyk defend their home against the armies of the evil First Order. Plus, R2-D2, C-3PO, and BB-8 team up on a top-secret spy adventure for the Resistance.
